GSD.description:
dm stats: add cond_resched when looping over entries

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.2 by commit ddd5cd42bc5714e926be74b87eb1354b04f9d082. For more details please see the references link.
